DOC.brief_summary: Parallel , Multi-Center , Double-masked , Active control , three arm study compare IOP lower efficacy safety 12 month morning even instillation Travoprost/Brinzolamide vs. Cosopt dose morning evening patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: 1 Year Study Trav/Brinz QD Fixed Combination Versus COSOPT
DOC.criteria: IOP screen visit < 18mmHg least one eye Mean IOP eye ( eligibility 1 & 2 visit ) 24 ≤ 36 mmHg 9:00 21 ≤ 36 mmHg 11:00 16:00 Severe central visual field loss Angle Shaffer grade < 2 C/D ratio > 0.8 ( horizontal vertical measurement )
